samusZ.name: Power Beam
samusZ.description:
Rapidly fire an energy blast for <y>120% damage</c>. <#fffb33>Range increases with level.</c>
<b>Agile: You can shoot while moving.</c>

samusX.name: Missile Launcher
samusX.description:
Fire a <y>powerful missile</c> that explodes on impact, dealing <y>400% damage</c>.
<b>Agile.</c>

samusC.name: Flash Shift
samusC.description:
Blink <y>forward a short distance.</c>
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while blinking.

samusV.name: Morph Bomb
samusV.description: Curl into a ball and lay a <y>small, timed bomb</c> that explodes for <y>300% damage</c>.

samus.endQuote: ...and so she left, with another metroid to remake.
samus.description: <y>Samus</c> has received a distress call from the <y>UES Contact Light</c>!
samus.name: Samus
samus.story: Samus is under fire! She's sent an emergency directive: "Join the fight!"
